title: Sail into your new home this summer and save $150!
posting_body: ['💌The Arts at Broadway Commons 💌', '802 Broadway Commons', 'Garland, TX 75038', '📞 P:', 'show contact info', '💘Ask for Ashley 💘', '🔑The Arts at Broadway Commons specializes in making you feel right at home.', '1 and 2 bedrooms available call today for a specialized quote!', '🔑', '💜- B1 2 Bedroom starting at an unbeatable price, $1,614- Today Only!', '✨', '🏡Enjoy spacious closets, home décor fixtures, ceiling fans, and spacious bedrooms.', 'Select apartment homes offer granite countertops, cherry wood cabinets and European bowl sinks.', '🏡', '🌳The Arts at Broadway Commons offers all residents our 24 hr. laundry facility, picnic/BBQ area, playground, dog park, 4 sparkling swimming pools, and a business/fitness center all surrounded by a welcoming community!', 'Residents also enjoy peace of mind with 24-hour emergency maintenance services and convenience with online bill pay accessibility.', '🌳', '🛒We are conveniently located close to public transportation and 3 grocery stores!', "We're also near many dining and recreational locations.", '🛒', '😊We have a friendly staff that is always ready to help in any way possible, community events, fresh snacks, and a coffee bar in the front office!', 'Please contact our lovely leasing agent, Ashley to schedule your tour.', '😊', 'ASK FOR ASHLEY!!!', 'Apply for #1508 online today!!', '<URL>', 'Thank you,']
